about_the_game:
"The 9th Station of M.t..." is a horror walking simulator game similar to Exit 8 where you descend from the 9th station of the mountain.

Although the mountain road continues to look the same for a long time, there may be some changes occurring.

If you notice anything unusual, please return to the trail.

If you don't find anything unusual, please continue.

Look around you and escape safely from the mountain.

The game is cleared when you reach the 0th station.


There are 2 endings. If you can find all the abnormalities and escape from the mountain safely, you will get the true ending.

Video Distribution

・Distribution is available without permission.
・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and horror imagery.

name: The 9th Station of M.t...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Home
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2070 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: While being careful of any abnormalities, continue down the mountain path that continues like a cycle and try to escape safely.
